examples.example: 只要坚持努力，相信终有一日会实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: As long as you keep working hard, believe that one day your dream will come true.

examples.example: 度过充实的一日，能让我们收获满满的快乐和满足。

translate.english: Spending a fulfilling day can enable us to gain a lot of happiness and satisfaction.

examples.example: 每一日的清晨，阳光都会给世界带来新的希望和活力。

translate.english: Every morning of each day, the sunshine will bring new hope and vitality to the world.
